(Code, sorry, I am just "preaching the message" as it were.  Liono is in 
control of the Ark as far as I know, and I KNOW he put all of the People's 
group on enemy.  So you can't just waltz right in.  If your guys want to be 
Maximal, work it out with Liono.  He doesn't seem to want to be allies with 
your People's Group, and he's set the defenses to monitor you as enemy.  So 
if you come in range, you will be shot and you wouldn't be let inside unless 
someone opened them.  That's all I know.  Discuss it with Liono, not myself)
